headline: Morgan Stanley Lowers its Price Target on News Corporation (NWS) to $32.40 and Maintains an Overweight Rating
summary: News Corporation (NASDAQ:NWS) is among the 11 Best Entertainment Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street. On February 6, 2026, Morgan Stanley lowered its price target on News Corporation (NASDAQ:NWS) to $32.40 from $38 previously and maintained an Overweight rating, updating estimates after first-half fiscal 2026 results. Morgan Stanley has noted that there is no […]

headline: 3 Cash-Heavy Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: Companies with more cash than debt can be financially resilient, but that doesn’t mean they’re all strong investments. Some lack leverage because they struggle to grow or generate consistent profits, making them unattractive borrowers.
